title: IS621: Agile and DevSecOps
text: This course covers agile methodologies and DevSecOps practices for modern software development. Topics include: Agile process execution, user stories, planning, estimation, sprint tracking, XP practices such as code review, pair programming, refactoring, testing, and CI/CD. Students learn how to integrate security considerations early in development process (shift left). The project requires students to form teams to develop a new software system following agile principles and DevSecOps practices.
